name: No Entry!
description:
Some people want to get in. But they are banned.
You are the security guard of this place. It is your duty to block them like a guard.
Remember, they are very cunning, they will try to get in anyway. Can you accurately control the entrances to your venue and be the best security guard?
Features:
• Smooth gameplay
• Toony art style
• Dynamic mechanism
• Engaging levels
